title: extraVEGANza Pgh
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering, Fusion
description: Inside Schwartz Market you will find this vegan, gluten-free cafe and juice bar offering items such as grilled carrot hotdogs on anti-wheat seed-grain bun, raw pizza on dehydrated whole grain-seed crust, open-face roasted veggie sandwich, raw zucchini lasagna, raw soup, raw cinnamon buns, and raw cacao walnut brownies. Here since spring 2015.
